patthana8.10:1.1_0: Nasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.10:1.1_1: Nasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.10:1.1_2: Nasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasappaṭigho ca naappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.10:2.1_0: Naappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.10:3.1_0: Nasappaṭighañca naappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.10:4.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
patthana8.10:6.1_0: Nasappaṭigho dhammo nasappaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana8.10:6.1_1: Nasappaṭigho dhammo naappaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana8.10:6.1_2: Nasappaṭigho dhammo nasappaṭighassa ca naappaṭighassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana8.10:7.1_0: Nasappaṭigho dhammo nasappaṭighassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana8.10:7.1_1: Naappaṭigho dhammo nasappaṭighassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana8.10:8.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare ekaṁ …pe…
patthana8.10:8.1_1: sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye dve, purejāte pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane ekaṁ, kamme …pe…
patthana8.10:8.1_2: āhāre tīṇi, indriye pañca, jhāne magge tīṇi, sampayutte ekaṁ, vippayutte cattāri …pe…
